item.title: Big Buck Bunny (HAS) - all bitrates
item.description: HAS Type Adaptive VoD Content : adaptively switches from/to stream using all available bitrates(0.5M, 1M, 2M, 4M)

item.title: Big Buck Bunny (HAS) - 2M, 4M
item.description: HAS Type Adaptive VoD Content : adaptively switches from/to stream using 2Mbps, 4Mbps bitrates

item.title: Big Buck Bunny (HAS) - 1M, 2M
item.description: HAS Type Adaptive VoD Content : adaptively switches from/to stream using 1Mbps, 2Mbps bitrates

item.title: Big Buck Bunny (HAS) - 0.5M
item.description: HAS Type Adaptive VoD Content : use 0.5Mbps bitrates stream. There'll be no adaptive stream switching

item.title: Big Buck Bunny (HLS)
item.description: HLS Type Adaptive VoD Content : adaptively switches from/to stream using all available bitrates
